definitions.definition: Used to express discontent, unhappiness, or anger.
examples: Oh, hell ! I got another parking ticket.

definitions.label_groups: colloquial , sometimes vulgar , no longer productive

definitions.definition: Used to introduce an intensified statement following an understated one ; nay; not only that, but.
examples: Do it, or, rest assured, there will be no more Middle Eastern crisis – hell , there will be no more Middle East!

main_definition: ( colloquial , sometimes vulgar ) Used to express discontent, unhappiness, or anger.
secondary_definitions: ( colloquial , sometimes vulgar , no longer productive ) Used to emphasize.
( colloquial , sometimes vulgar ) Used to introduce an intensified statement following an understated one ; nay; not only that, but.
